ygData.subject: When partners leave (was Re: [Re: Greetings]
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well, I am happy with my guild and with my story as it has evolved.  We are heavily active on the Brell Serillis board in EQVault and it is fun to write up
ygData.messageBody:
"Suzanne J. Johnson" <katannah@...> wrote:

>your enjoyment
>will get back to what it was, one way or another. (1) You will be very
>happy you chose your server and stuck with it, or (2) you will find a
>partner who better suits you, or (3) you and your current partner will
>resolve the conflicts you have. Any which way you choose, it will come
>back once you get the chance to remember why you bought the game.

Well, I am happy with my guild and with my story as it has evolved. We are
heavily active on the Brell Serillis board in EQVault and it is fun to write
up the story much as I did when I met my first partner and wrote Dnaice's
story on Longroads.com. Look for the story starting with "So you want to know
Cabri" followed by a post from Trucid about ".. when I saw" and followed by
"Dnaisha's Dark Night of the Soul".

So, the game is still fun and I don't miss the last month of the partnership.
But I DO miss the first month. I guess it will always be like that. My new
"romantic interest" is much less interested in the romantic story and much
more interested in the group story. So be it. Maybe I'll kill him afterall
*smiles darkly*

Dnaisha on Brell Serillis
